columns.School_ID: The unique identifier of each university.
columns.School: The official name of the university.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the university.
columns.Founded: The year the university was established.
columns.Affiliation: The type of institution, whether public or private.
columns.Enrollment: The number of students enrolled at the university.
columns.Nickname: The commonly used nickname for the university's sports teams.
columns.Primary_conference: The main athletic conference the university belongs to.

university.table_description: The table provides details about various universities.

columns.Team_ID: The unique identifier for each basketball team.
columns.School_ID: The identifier linking the team to its university.
columns.Team_Name: The official name of the basketball team.
columns.ACC_Regular_Season: The team's record during the ACC regular season.
columns.ACC_Percent: The winning percentage during the ACC season.
columns.ACC_Home: The team's record in home ACC games.
columns.ACC_Road: The team's record in away ACC games.
columns.All_Games: The team's record in all games played.
columns.All_Games_Percent: The winning percentage across all games played.
columns.All_Home: The team's record in home games.
columns.All_Road: The team's record in away games.
columns.All_Neutral: The team's record in neutral site games.

basketball_match.table_description: The table details performance statistics for basketball teams.
